name: Gears Of Babies
description:
Gears of Babies : Diapers and Milk is a free third person shooter with an action hero baby protagonist.

 The story of the game is about a baby who wants to take away his milk and diapers.

game features:

  1. Intense and exciting shooter gameplay
  2. Beautiful and colorful environment
  3. Entertaining and simple story
  4. beautiful graphic with good performance on older PCs
